skills.name: Stardust Ace
desc:
Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **300%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **180%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **108%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **315%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **189%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **113%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **330%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **198%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **119%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **345%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **207%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **124%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **360%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **216%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **130%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **375%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **225%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **135%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **394%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **236%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **142%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **413%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **248%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **149%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

eidolons.name: A Falling Star
eidolons.desc: When enemies are defeated due to the Trailblazer's Ultimate, the Trailblazer regenerates 10 extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per attack.

eidolons.name: An Unwilling Host
eidolons.desc: Attacking enemies with Physical Weakness restores the Trailblazer's HP equal to 5% of the Trailblazer's ATK.

eidolons.name: A Leading Whisper
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: A Destructing Glance
eidolons.desc: When attacking an enemy with Weakness Break, CRIT Rate is increased by 25%.

eidolons.name: A Surviving Hope
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: A Trailblazing Will
eidolons.desc: The Trailblazer's Talent is also triggered when they defeat an enemy.

skillTree.name: Ready for Battle
skillTree.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

skillTree.name: Perseverance
skillTree.desc: Each Talent stack increases the Trailblazer's DEF by 10%.

skillTree.name: Fighting Will
skillTree.desc: When using Skill or Ultimate "Blowout: RIP Home Run", DMG dealt to the target enemy is increased by 25%.
